Some thoughts of mine

  • Favorite fruits

    Like my late grandfather, I eat a lot of fruits. Maybe about 500g every day.

  • Bananas

    Whenever I eat bananas nowadays, I peel from the head, not the stem. I do so unconsciously, because my friend Reza taught me about how this is way more efficient and said this is how itâ€™s supposed to be done. So I have followed his advice ever since grade 12.
